name: Sly'sKansasCity
0:
”Alexa, open sly's k. c.”
”Alexa, ask sly's k. c. How many people live in KC”
”Alexa, ask sly's k. c. What is the best barbecue in Kansas City”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sly's k. c.
des:
The Mayor of Kansas City wants to answer all your questions about his beautiful city and it's residents - including the current arts scene, entertainment districts, and championship sports teams to it's incredible historic jazz district, River Market, and Negro League museum. Our city is thriving, and Sly James is willing to take on all questions - from "Where is the best BBQ?" and "Why is Kansas City in Missouri" to "Do you like Daft Punk?" and "What is the best barbecue in Kansas City"

Fire Away!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
